title: Rachel Zoe proves she's a true fashionista as she turns heads at the InStyle Awards
text:
She's both a designer and fashion icon.

And Rachel Zoe was a true fashionista when she stepped out for the InStyle Awards on Monday evening in Los Angeles.

The 48-year-old beauty stunned in one of her designs as she graced the red carpet solo.

Stunner: Rachel Zoe proved she was a true fashionista on Monday night when she stepped out in a gorgeous gown for the InStyle Awards in Los Angeles

Rachel opted for a blue and gold frock that was cinched in at the waist before flaring out into a pleated design.

She teamed the look with statement necklaces and earrings for to complete her ensemble.

The designer styled her hair out into old Hollywood waves that were brushed over to one side.

Stellar: Rachel opted for a blue and gold frock that was cinched in at the waist before flaring out into a pleated design

Gorgeous: Rachel's glam was kept dewy with contoured cheekbones, a dark smokey eye and a pop of color on her lips

Rachel's glam was kept dewy with contoured cheekbones, a dark smokey eye and a pop of color on her lips.

The mom-of-two took to social media following the event to showcase a sweet photo of her kids fast asleep in her bed.

'Came home to two little human that took over my bed and then an hour later.....' she teased the first photo.

She continued: 'My baby boy Kaius wakes up with a fever and cough out of nowhere #sickseason is here and it's real.'

The ladies: During the night she was pictured with Oliva Palermo and Nina Dobrev

Angels: The mom-of-two took to social media following the event to showcase a sweet photo of her kids fast asleep in her bed

Rachel then seemingly stayed up the entire night caring for her sick five-year-old.

'Actually sleeping with my eyes open watching Kaius sleep with a high fever #momlife.'

Rachel shared a selfie on Tuesday revealing she had didn't take her makeup off so she could sport the look today.

And perhaps a lack of sleep resulted in Rachel not comprehending what one of her comments was really about, snapping at a user.

On the job: Rachel then seemingly stayed up the entire night caring for her sick five-year-old

Oops! And perhaps a lack of sleep resulted in Rachel not comprehending what one of her comments was really about, snapping at a user

'Your eyes are fantastic, but when are duck lips going to go out of style?' they commented on her post from last night.

'these r the lips i was born with so don't be a jerk please unfollow me,' Rachel responded.

The user clarified: '@rachelzoe I meant the face that everyone is still making for pictures. Didn't say you did anything to your lips.'

Rachel is yet to respond.
description: Rachel Zoe proved she was a true fashionista on Monday night when she stepped out in a gorgeous gown for the InStyle Awards in Los Angeles.
